sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Morocco declares three days of mourning after the death toll from a powerful earthquake soars to more than 2,000.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Mass destruction and a climbing death toll.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Three days of mourning have been declared in Morocco after a catastrophic earthquake has left at least 2,000 people dead. ويوميات الصباح يتم تحديدها في مراكو بعد أن تتحولت إلى مصاب لأقل من 2000 شخص ويجب أن يكون لديه أكثر من مصابين كثيرين وإلا أكثر من ألفين The King Mohammed the Sixth has ordered the immediate creation of an inter-ministerial commission to organize relief, aid, care and restoration.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Residents of remote villages say they have, aid, care and restoration.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Residents of remote villages say they have no water, food or electricity.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Indian Prime Minister and G20 host Narendra Modi announced a consensus had been reached on its leaders' declaration on the first day of talks in New Delhi.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The declaration stopped short of condemning Russia for the war in Ukraine but did warn states against seizing territory. The African Union was granted permanent member status in the G20, with Modi saying it turned the grouping into a people's G20.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: US President Biden, EU chief von der Leyen and Modi unveiled a rail and shipping project linking India to the Middle East and Europe. This is nothing but historic.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: It will be the most direct connection to date between India, the Arabian Gulf and Europe with a rail link that will make trade between India and Europe 40% faster.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The corridor would help to boost trade, transport energy resources and improve digital connectivity.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The project aims to serve as a counterpoint to China's Belt and Road Initiative, also known as the New Silk Road.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Showering potential voters with promises, Poland's two main political parties, Law and Justice and the Civic Coalition, unveiled their campaign programs ahead of the parliamentary elections on 15 October.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The nationalist-ruling Law and Justice Party wants to win an unprecedented third term.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: At a party convention, leader Jaroslaw Kaczynski promised new spending on social and military causes for the nation living in the shadow of Russia's war in neighbouring Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: On the other hand, the Civic Coalition vows to reverse the negative trends in foreign and home policy, mending fences with Brussels and to secure funds frozen now by the EU.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Party leader Donald Tusk has also promised to free state media and cultural activities from their current restrictions and censorship.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Opinion polls suggest that law and justice may garner the most electoral votes, but not enough to continue its current narrow control of the parliament.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: There are at least 420,000 Russian servicemen in occupied territories of Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: That's what Kyiv's intelligence chief told those at the Yalta European Strategy Forum in the capital.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The conference was founded in 2004 to discuss Ukrainian euro integration goals among politicians and businessmen. The chief of the Ukrainian military intelligence also assured conference attendees that the Ukrainian counteroffensive will go on despite unfavorable weather conditions expected in late autumn and winter.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: British police have confirmed that an ex-soldier who escaped from prison on Wednesday morning while awaiting trial on terrorism charges was later spotted walking away from a busy roundabout in South London just three minutes' drive from the jail.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The Metropolitan Police's Counter Terror Commander says the inmate managed to flee the prison's kitchen strapped to the bottom of a delivery lorry. Authorities are offering up to £22,000 for information that directly leads to the arrest and capture of the 21-year-old fugitive.
